title: Wells Fargo Profit Rises 59% on Reserve Release
sub_head: Bank beat analyst expectations, but quarterly revenue fell 2%
body:
Wells Fargo & Co . said Thursday that its third-quarter profit rose 59%, lifted by a release of funds it had set aside for potential loan losses during the pandemic.
The San Francisco-based lender posted earnings of $5.12 billion. Per-share earnings of $1.17 topped a forecast of $1.
